Police are investigating the incident, while denying claims of forced entry and third-party involvement.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/pune/harassed-by-cops-mob-for-citizenship-proof-say-kargil-war-veterans-kin-in-pune/articleshow/122983479.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/pune/harassed-by-cops-mob-for-citizenship-proof-say-kargil-war-veterans-kin-in-pune/articleshow/122983479.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 05:23:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ALIM SHAIKH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="497396" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122990281,imgsize-497396.cms"/></item><item><title>Tsunami hits Hawaii: Traffic gridlock as residents evacuate; flights diverted</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/tsunami-hits-hawaii-traffic-gridlock-as-residents-evacuate-low-lying-areas-flights-diverted/articleshow/122990613.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/tsunami-hits-hawaii-traffic-gridlock-as-residents-evacuate-low-lying-areas-flights-diverted/articleshow/122990613.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 11:57:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3391579" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122991332,imgsize-3391579.cms"/></item><item><title>'Some people are uncomfortable with history': EAM slams Congress in RS over IWT - Top quotes</title><description><![CDATA[External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar addressed the Rajya Sabha on Operation Sindoor, following the Pahalgam terror attack. He affirmed the government's firm stance against terrorism, highlighting diplomatic actions, including potentially suspending the Indus Waters Treaty. Jaishankar refuted claims of US mediation for a ceasefire between India and Pakistan.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/some-people-are-uncomfortable-with-history-jaishankar-slams-congress-in-rajya-sabha-over-iwt-top-quotes/articleshow/122993509.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/some-people-are-uncomfortable-with-history-jaishankar-slams-congress-in-rajya-sabha-over-iwt-top-quotes/articleshow/122993509.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 14:17:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="915816" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122993606,imgsize-915816.cms"/></item><item><title>Elon Musk corrects 'hiring post' of xAI's Aditya Gupta: Says Starting today...</title><description><![CDATA[Elon Musk's xAI is doing away with the title "researcher," opting for "engineer" for all technical roles, a decision prompted by Musk's direct intervention on X. This move aims to eliminate what Musk sees as a two-tiered system, aligning xAI with companies like OpenAI and Anthropic that favor unified technical titles.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/elon-musk-corrects-hiring-post-of-xais-aditya-gupta-says-starting-today-there-are-only-engineers-/articleshow/122990990.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/elon-musk-corrects-hiring-post-of-xais-aditya-gupta-says-starting-today-there-are-only-engineers-/articleshow/122990990.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 12:05:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="17544" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122990962,imgsize-17544.cms"/></item><item><title>EXCLUSIVE | Gambhir's message to Jurel: 'Mauka milega, ready rehna'</title><description><![CDATA[Twice in the five-match series, Dhruv Jurel was asked to don the wicketkeeping gloves — and the 24-year-old didn’t disappoint his captain. In the third Test, after coming on as a substitute keeper, he took three catches. In the fourth Test, he displayed sharp reflexes behind the stumps, effecting two stumpings and taking two catches.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/mauka-milega-ready-rehna-what-coach-gautam-gambhir-told-dhruv-jurel-during-england-test-series/articleshow/122991756.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/mauka-milega-ready-rehna-what-coach-gautam-gambhir-told-dhruv-jurel-during-england-test-series/articleshow/122991756.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 12:46:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AMIT KUMAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="25600" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122991868,imgsize-25600.cms"/></item><item><title>Meet Mira Murati: The AI brain behind ChatGPT; rejected Zuckerberg’s$1BMetaoffer</title><description><![CDATA[Mira Murati, the former CTO of OpenAI, rejected a $1 billion offer from Meta, demonstrating her team's confidence in her leadership and the vision of her AI startup, Thinking Machines Lab. Despite Meta's lucrative offers to team members, they chose to remain independent, believing in the potential of their equity and the opportunity to shape AI's future.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/who-is-mira-murati-former-openai-cto-who-rejected-mark-zuckerbergs-1-billion-offer-to-join-meta-ai/articleshow/122994020.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/who-is-mira-murati-former-openai-cto-who-rejected-mark-zuckerbergs-1-billion-offer-to-join-meta-ai/articleshow/122994020.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 14:27:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44662" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122993989,imgsize-44662.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Violent shaking of Russian buildings captured after massive earthquake</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/watch-violent-shaking-of-russian-buildings-captured-after-massive-earthquake-damage-reported-in-kamchatka/articleshow/122991167.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/watch-violent-shaking-of-russian-buildings-captured-after-massive-earthquake-damage-reported-in-kamchatka/articleshow/122991167.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 12:54:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3216132" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122992086,imgsize-3216132.cms"/></item><item><title>Russia earthquake: Tsunami warning issued for Hawaii; What Tsunami Warning, Watch and Advisory mean</title><description><![CDATA[A massive 8.8 magnitude earthquake off Russia's coast has triggered tsunami warnings across the Pacific, including Alaska, Hawaii, and the US West Coast. A tsunami warning indicates that a tsunami is either already occurring or is expected to hit soon. Officials are cautioning residents to move inland, especially near Northern California, where waves could reach 5.5 feet.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/tsunami-warning-issued-for-hawaii-after-earthquake-off-russia-what-tsunami-warning-watch-and-advisory-mean-and-are-different-from-each-other/articleshow/122992184.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/tsunami-warning-issued-for-hawaii-after-earthquake-off-russia-what-tsunami-warning-watch-and-advisory-mean-and-are-different-from-each-other/articleshow/122992184.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 12:57:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44306" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122992178,imgsize-44306.cms"/></item><item><title>'It is entitled behaviour of English' - Ex-India keeper on Gambhir vs curator</title><description><![CDATA[A controversy involving Gautam Gambhir and Lee Fortis has surfaced before the crucial fifth Test match between India and England. The incident occurred during India's practice session. Parthiv Patel supported Gambhir and criticised England's behaviour. Patel also highlighted the importance of domestic leagues and praised young Indian wicketkeepers Rishabh Pant and Dhruv Jurel. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-it-is-entitled-behaviour-of-the-english-former-india-wicket-keeper-on-gautam-gambhir-vs-pitch-curator-controversy/articleshow/122993570.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-it-is-entitled-behaviour-of-the-english-former-india-wicket-keeper-on-gautam-gambhir-vs-pitch-curator-controversy/articleshow/122993570.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 14:18:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PRANAV SHUKLA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="40440" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122993813,imgsize-40440.cms"/></item><item><title>'If PM says something ... ': Rahul says Modi unable to refute Trump's ceasefire claims</title><description><![CDATA[Rahul Gandhi criticizes Narendra Modi regarding Donald Trump's assertions about mediating peace. Rahul suggests Modi can't refute Trump due to potential revelations. S Jaishankar denies any phone calls between Modi and Trump during a specific period. Rahul challenges Modi to call Trump a liar in Parliament.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/if-pm-says-something-rahul-gandhi-says-modi-unable-to-refute-trumps-ceasefire-claims-dares-him-to-call-us-president-liar/articleshow/122993502.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/if-pm-says-something-rahul-gandhi-says-modi-unable-to-refute-trumps-ceasefire-claims-dares-him-to-call-us-president-liar/articleshow/122993502.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 14:03:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1324731" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122993520,imgsize-1324731.cms"/></item><item><title>SC reserves verdict on Justice Varma's plea - What the top court said</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court has reserved its decision on Justice Yashwant Varma's challenge to a report finding him culpable in a cash discovery matter. The court questioned Varma's participation in the inquiry without initially contesting its validity. His counsel argued that the panel's removal suggestion violated constitutional principles, emphasizing the problematic precedent it would establish.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/your-conduct-does-not-inspire-confidence-sc-reserves-verdict-on-justice-yashwant-varmas-plea-what-the-top-court-said/articleshow/122991960.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/your-conduct-does-not-inspire-confidence-sc-reserves-verdict-on-justice-yashwant-varmas-plea-what-the-top-court-said/articleshow/122991960.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 13:21:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="15152" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122992519,imgsize-15152.cms"/></item><item><title>TCS layoffs: Ex Tech Mahindra CEO CP Gurnani quotes Sholay - message to techies</title><description><![CDATA[Amidst TCS layoffs, CP Gurnani urges the Indian tech industry to move beyond headcount obsession and embrace outcome-based models. He emphasizes a shift from the traditional pyramid structure, advocating for enhanced productivity, specialized skills, and advanced technological capabilities. Experts suggest that upskilling and reskilling are crucial for tech professionals in this evolving landscape.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/tcs-layoffs-former-tech-mahindra-ceo-cp-gurnani-quotes-sholay-line-and-sends-a-message-to-techies/articleshow/122970365.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/tcs-layoffs-former-tech-mahindra-ceo-cp-gurnani-quotes-sholay-line-and-sends-a-message-to-techies/articleshow/122970365.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 13:11:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30336" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122970349,imgsize-30336.cms"/></item><item><title>Microsoft restores IT service to Russia-backed Indian refinery after EU sanctions</title><description><![CDATA[Microsoft has restored IT services to Nayara Energy, an Indian oil refinery backed by Russia. A lawsuit was filed by Nayara Energy due to service suspension following EU sanctions. The sanctions have significantly impacted Nayara's operations, leading to reduced refinery activities. Microsoft confirmed the restoration of services after Nayara's lawyer informed a New Delhi court that the matter had been resolved.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/some-relief-for-nayara-microsoft-restores-it-services-to-russia-backed-indian-oil-refinery-us-company-abruptly-halted-operations-after-eu-sanctions/articleshow/122993612.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/some-relief-for-nayara-microsoft-restores-it-services-to-russia-backed-indian-oil-refinery-us-company-abruptly-halted-operations-after-eu-sanctions/articleshow/122993612.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 14:09:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23572" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122993626,imgsize-23572.cms"/></item><item><title>Bank Holidays in August: On what days will banks be closed? Check list</title><description><![CDATA[August 2025 will see several bank holidays across India. Banks will be closed nationwide for Independence Day on August 15th. Despite facing competition from ‘Mahavtar Narsimha’, the film earned ₹9.25 crore on its second Monday and showed slight growth on Tuesday. With a total collection of ₹267.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-13-the-ahaan-panday-aneet-padda-movie-inches-towards-rs-270-crore-after-making-rs-10-crore-on-second-tuesday/articleshow/122993082.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-13-the-ahaan-panday-aneet-padda-movie-inches-towards-rs-270-crore-after-making-rs-10-crore-on-second-tuesday/articleshow/122993082.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 13:42:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="29632" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122993070,imgsize-29632.cms"/></item><item><title>Typhoon Co-May makes landfall in China: Orange alert issued in Shanghai</title><description><![CDATA[Typhoon Co-May disrupted eastern China, making landfall in Zhoushan with 83 km/h winds, prompting mass evacuations of over 280,000 people. Shanghai faced flight cancellations, with over 640 flights grounded across its airports. Ferry services were halted, and speed limits were imposed. Simultaneously, a powerful earthquake off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula triggered tsunami alerts, later lifted, adding to the region's natural scare.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/china/typhoon-co-may-makes-landfall-in-china-orange-alert-issued-in-shanghai-over-280000-evacuated-flights-and-ferries-halted/articleshow/122992611.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/china/typhoon-co-may-makes-landfall-in-china-orange-alert-issued-in-shanghai-over-280000-evacuated-flights-and-ferries-halted/articleshow/122992611.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 13:54:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3028232" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122993354,imgsize-3028232.cms"/></item><item><title>Flight passengers evacuate via emergency slides after smoke detected — Watch</title><description><![CDATA[A Turkish Airlines Boeing 777 was evacuated at Antalya Airport after smoke emerged from the landing gear following its arrival from Istanbul. Emergency teams advised the evacuation as a precautionary measure, and all passengers were safely evacuated without any injuries. Preliminary investigations suggest a faulty hydraulic pipe caused the smoke, and the aircraft is undergoing technical assessment.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/panic-at-turkish-airport-boeing-777-passengers-evacuate-via-emergency-slides-after-smoke-detected-watch/articleshow/122988682.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/panic-at-turkish-airport-boeing-777-passengers-evacuate-via-emergency-slides-after-smoke-detected-watch/articleshow/122988682.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 11:09:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4152189" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122989845,imgsize-4152189.cms"/></item><item><title> 'Security protocol': Why Divya played World Cup-winning move inside empty venue</title><description><![CDATA[Divya Deshmukh made history by winning the FIDE Women's World Cup in Batumi. The 19-year-old defeated Grandmaster (GM) Koneru Humpy in a tense tie-break. Spectators were absent during the final moments due to FIDE regulations. Divya's victory marks a significant moment for Indian women's chess. She also became India’s 88th Grandmaster.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/chess-security-protocol-why-divya-deshmukh-played-world-cup-winning-move-inside-empty-venue/articleshow/122990349.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/chess-security-protocol-why-divya-deshmukh-played-world-cup-winning-move-inside-empty-venue/articleshow/122990349.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 11:38:20 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>JYOTIRMOY HALDER</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57932" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122990360,imgsize-57932.cms"/></item><item><title>Ports destroyed, whales washed ashore: Tsunami hits Russian, Japanese coasts - Watch</title><description><![CDATA[A strong earthquake struck off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula. It triggered a large tsunami. Coastal areas faced evacuation. Submerged buildings and massive water drenching were seen. The quake's magnitude was 8.7. Tsunami waves reached up to 4 meters. Warnings issued for Japan, Hawaii, and other Pacific regions. People were asked to leave their homes. The earthquake was the strongest in decades.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/watch-tsunami-hits-russias-kamchatka-coast-after-8-7-earthquake-waves-up-to-4-metres-recorded/articleshow/122986495.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/watch-tsunami-hits-russias-kamchatka-coast-after-8-7-earthquake-waves-up-to-4-metres-recorded/articleshow/122986495.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 07:31:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3434914" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122988887,imgsize-3434914.cms"/></item><item><title>Explained: Why are WBJEE 2024 results delayed?</title><description><![CDATA[The WBJEE 2024 results remain stalled nearly three months after the exam, as a legal dispute over OBC reservations halts their release. Despite being ready on June 5, the board cited its lack of authority amid the sub-judice matter. The delay has sparked widespread anxiety among students and disrupted academic schedules across engineering colleges in Bengal.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/why-are-wbjee-2024-results-still-delayed-legal-tussle-over-obc-quota-puts-thousands-in-limbo/articleshow/122988707.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/why-are-wbjee-2024-results-still-delayed-legal-tussle-over-obc-quota-puts-thousands-in-limbo/articleshow/122988707.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 10:08:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="20678" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122988754,imgsize-20678.cms"/></item><item><title>ITR-3 enabled for e-filing: Key things to know before filing for AY 2025–26</title><description><![CDATA[The Income Tax Department has facilitated online ITR-3 filing for AY 2025-26, benefiting individuals with income from share trading, business ventures, and unlisted shares. Pakistan vs Australia witnesses bizarre moment - Watch</title><description><![CDATA[In a World Championship of Legends 2025 match, John Hastings bowled a strange over. The over included 12 wides and a no-ball. Pakistan Champions were chasing a small target. Saeed Ajmal took six wickets, dismantling Australia Champions. Sharjeel Khan and Sohaib Maqsood easily secured a 10-wicket victory for Pakistan. Hastings's over became a talking point among fans.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/18-balls-in-one-over-pakistan-vs-australia-match-witnesses-bizarre-moment-in-wcl-2025-watch/articleshow/122986770.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/18-balls-in-one-over-pakistan-vs-australia-match-witnesses-bizarre-moment-in-wcl-2025-watch/articleshow/122986770.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 07:57:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="24320" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122986942,imgsize-24320.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Honeymoon in Shillong’: Film on Raja Raghuvanshi murder announced</title><description><![CDATA[The Raja Raghuvanshi murder case, which involved allegations of his wife and accomplices killing him during their honeymoon in Shillong, is set to be depicted in a film titled ‘Honeymoon in Shillong.’ Raja's brother unveiled the film's poster, stating it aims to portray the events leading to Raja's death and the circumstances surrounding the case.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/raipur/honeymoon-in-shillong-now-film-on-raja-murder/articleshow/122981837.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/raipur/honeymoon-in-shillong-now-film-on-raja-murder/articleshow/122981837.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 23:31:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="55808" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122987097,imgsize-55808.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/tata-capital-ipo-valuation-raised-drhp-filing-19642326.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Sources say the company is likely to file its updated Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) as early as tomorrow or by the end of this week. Tata Capital plans to raise around $2 billion through the IPO, which is expected to launch in the first half of September this year. The IPO is being driven by a regulatory mandate. In September 2022, the Reserve Bank of India classified Tata Capital as an upper-layer systemically important NBFC, requiring it to go public within three years.
